title: Geo Quiz Game
description:
Know all the world flags and capitals? Think so? Guess the country then! It's a game for all those geography quiz fans, interested people, casual players, kids, adults, students and teachers.
Geo Quiz Game - It's a casual trivia game where you can learn, test your knowledge and have some fun either alone or with your friends.

Choose a game mode: flags only, capitals or the extreme errorless mode! You get more points the faster you answer. Try to unlock all the achievements, hidden or not, and show them to your friends!

How to play?
1. Choose the game mode and number of questions.
2. Guess the right answers within 4 possibilities.
3. The faster you are, more points you'll get.
4. Guess the country!


Compete and compare your scores and unlocked achievements with your friends. Try to be the best!

Much, much more to come!
